sentences.english: One original caprice for violin solo by N. Paganini or of a comparable level of difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 帕格尼尼小提琴独奏狂想曲或一首同等难度的作品。

sentences.english: She deserved it, because she played Paganini better than anyone else in the world.
sentences.chinese: 她当之无愧，因为她拉的帕格尼尼是世界第一。

sentences.english: Paganini had led a wild lfe as a youth, and his health was poor in later years.
sentences.chinese: 帕格尼尼青年时代生活放荡，晚年健康情况极差。

sentences.english: Dance with the Devil Defeat Paganini, the Demon Violinist.
sentences.chinese: 与击败了帕格尼尼，恶魔小提琴的恶魔舞蹈。

sentences.english: Paganini had led a wild life as a youth.
sentences.chinese: 帕格尼尼青年时代生活放荡。

sentences.english: Paganini was first given a mandolin and then at the age of 7 a violin to play.
sentences.chinese: 帕格尼尼是第一次在曼陀林和7岁然后小提琴发挥。
